answers.answer: Metformin, like other medications, can cause a fair number of gastric issues. If you're not watching the fat in your diet, this med in addition to fat in the diet (after having your GB removed) can cause problems such as those you're mentioning. If you are consuming fats, try cutting back and see if that's of help.
